duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative service support in a complex environment, addressing billing questions, policy changes, rate changes, discounts, and providing support for Farmers.com/mobile app.
Empower and proactively share knowledge to provide a positive customer experience, building effective communication skills to deliver insurance and eligibility information, solutions and initiatives.
Analyze, clarify, and resolve policy and account-related questions from internal and external customers, striving to provide a positive customer experience.
Review problems and communicate with appropriate personnel to obtain information when necessary, and respond to customer inquiries through appropriate mediums.
Attain performance level standards as outlined in performance objectives and stay current with relevant products.
Model Farmers core values and participate in insurance-related courses/seminars to expand product/system knowledge.

Meet or exceed individual performance, metrics, and goals, identify and suggest innovative process changes to support business practices, and demonstrate above-average written and verbal communication skills.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent. Four-year college degree preferred. Completion of required additional training.
